name: BOCES BALL GAME
description:
ARE YOU READY TO BALL?

Ball Game is a paddle-ball based game inspired by the millions of pong clones from the Atari 2600 Pong era of gaming! Ball Game features a hand drawn art style and a crazy cast of characters to boot. Face off against fellow students to aliens to a guy with a lampshade on his head for a chance to get the highest score! 

-MEET THE CAST-

Ball Game has 6 playable characters each featuring original art and SUPER! Abilities. Each character's design was made to stand out from the rest and allow you to choose which one is your favorite! Try out all of them to see which one is your favorite!


NOW THE QUESTION STANDS...

Now that you know the basics of what is going down there is only one question to ask you. Are you ready to Ball?
